text: Trying to make a coded subscription preferences template. Anyone know why im getting this error

I believe that you need additional parameters. You can try something like:
```
{% email_subscriptions "email_subscriptions" resubscribe_button_text='Yes, resubscribe me!', unsubscribe_single_text='Uncheck the types of emails you do not want to receive:', subheader_text='\n If this is not your email address, please ignore this page since the email associated with this page was most likely forwarded to you.\n', unsubscribe_all_unsubbed_text='You are presently unsubscribed from all of our emails. Would you like to receive our emails again?', button_text='Update email preferences', label='Subscription Preferences', header='Communication Preferences', unsubscribe_all_option='Unsubscribe me from all mailing lists.', unsubscribe_all_text='Or check here to never receive any emails:' %}
```
Got it - we're still looking into why things are loading so slowly, sorry about that!
for Custom Modules, is there a way to do a `no_wrapper=True` to the fields in the DM so you can grab just the content without all the html wrapping?
I usually just grab the value only
Does anyone know if its possible to have the fields populate the CSS portion? like if I have an image selector and then use the value from that in the CSS pane?
or is it all inline (which I am thinking it is)
that's the only way I've been able to do it at least
yea you have to do it inline

I mean if you want a similar feel to the css pane you could put a full on <style> tag in there but you better use the module.name in your selectors otherwise if you put multiple instances of the module in a page you’ll have some problems
I tried. even with all that, same thing
